p: This novel coronavirus has become a hot topic in the media and in research. However, the influenza virus, another infectious disease, is also a heavy burden on public health worldwide. Two disparate genera of the virus family Orthomyxoviridae, influenza A and B, also manifest as contagious respiratory diseases in infected individuals [ 2]. Influenza virus normally propagates during the cold season in temperate areas [ 3]. Pandemics of seasonal influenza have appeared every 20 to 30 years, generally accompanied by serious symptoms, which could have a detrimental effect on the development of young people and result in increased mortality rates [ 4â€“6].
